transmissions.description: Insightful series demonstrating that dogs aren't merely man's best friend.

transmissions.title: The Middle
transmissions.description: Mike is less than pleased when Frankie sets him up on an adult play date with a new neighbour. Meanwhile, Sue and the Wrestlerettes take on the cheerleaders in a cheer-off.

transmissions.title: The Middle
transmissions.description: While other kids begin receiving college acceptance letters and Axl still hasn't, Frankie and Mike begin to worry that their son's chances for a sports scholarship have passed him by.

transmissions.title: Modern Family
transmissions.description: Jay reluctantly takes Phil on a model-airplane excursion, and Gloria goes shopping with Alex. Meanwhile, Claire and Manny get to know one another as siblings.

transmissions.title: Daybreak
transmissions.description: `EastEnders' star Jessie Wallace and musician Gary Kemp chat about appearing in a revival of classic East End musical `Fings Ain't Wot They Used T'Be'.

transmissions.title: Lorraine
transmissions.description: Topical mix of entertainment, discussion and showbiz glamour as well as the latest fashion.

transmissions.title: The Jeremy Kyle Show
transmissions.description: Jeremy Kyle presents this show in which guests thrash out their conflicts and relationship issues.
